ceremony.title: Wedding Ceremony
ceremony.description: The Marriage Palace in Warsaw is a unique venue with a rich history. Our ceremony will take place in one of its beautiful neoclassical halls, enchantingly elegant and solemn.

reception.title: Wedding Reception
reception.description: The Reception Hall combines historical charm with modern comfort. Spacious interiors and stylish decorations create a unique atmosphere for joyful celebration.

dressCode.title: Dress Code
dressCode.description: Soft elegance in pastels — light, muted tones are perfect.

gifts.title: Gifts
gifts.description: Your presence is the greatest gift. If you wish, a small envelope will be appreciated.

additionalInfo.title: Additional Information
additionalInfo.description: On-site parking and accommodation tips will be shared closer to the date.

ceremony.title: Wedding Ceremony
ceremony.description: Exchanging our vows in the presence of those dearest to us.

reception.title: Welcome Reception
reception.description: A time for heartfelt wishes, a welcome toast, and the joyful start of our festivities.

dinner.title: Wedding Banquet
dinner.description: A formal celebratory meal and an opportunity for warm conversation.

party.title: First Dance
party.description: The moment music and dance officially open the evening's celebration.

cake.title: Wedding Cake
cake.description: A sweet interlude marked by the traditional cutting of the wedding cake.

midnight.title: Late Night Celebration
midnight.description: Continuing the festivities under the lights to the sounds of our favorite melodies.

Gallery.description: We would love to see this day through your eyes. Please share the moments you capture in our shared folder, where you can also return later to relive the celebration through everyone's photos.
images: Zofia and Jan on a quiet walk
Warm light captured in a tender moment

accommodation.q: Do you recommend hotels in Warsaw?
accommodation.a: Yes, we will share a short list of nearby hotel options.

transport.q: What is the easiest way to get there?
transport.a: Taxi or public transport is easiest; stops are a 3–5 minute walk away.

children.a: Absolutely — please let us know in the RSVP so we can prepare a seat.

parking.a: Yes, there are limited parking spaces on site.

RSVP.deadline: Please confirm your attendance by August 15, 2026.
RSVP.footerText: We can't wait to see you!

Story.imageAlt1: Zofia and Jan during a shared walk
Story.imageAlt2: Shared moments of Zofia and Jan
Story.quote: Love began with a small conversation and stayed with us ever since.
Story.historyParagraph1: We met in Warsaw at a place we both returned to after work. Over time, those meetings turned into daily joy.
Story.historyParagraph2: Travel, late-night talks, and small rituals became the foundation of our relationship. Today we are grateful to share this day with you.
Story.futureParagraph1: Our wedding is the start of a new chapter — calm, trusting, and full of plans.
Story.futureParagraph2: We invite you to celebrate in a place that is especially close to our hearts.
